numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In every major sports league, the ratio of players of color to coaches of color is at best 1.5 to 1.
2. In every major sports league, the ratio of players of color to coaches of color is at worst almost 7 to 1.
3. I wonder how sports with many players of color can lack head coaches of color.
4. It can be assumed that players of color are a large part of these sports.
5. I wonder why players of color are not more prominent in coaching positions.
6. Memphis has had a coach of color before.
7. I was not aware that this was so rare.
8. Memphis has many players of color on college teams.
9. Memphis has many players of color on professional league teams.
10. I think that representation in management is important.
11. The graph shows ratios of players of color to head coaches of color.
13. The headline is: Equality in the Future or the Present for Major Sports?
